name: Longstreet Partners
overview:
Longstreet Partners, LLC (“Longstreet”) is a private investment banking and consulting services firm focused on regional small to mid-sized enterprises. Founded in 2002, the firm’s partners have substantial experience of investing in, operating, growing, acquiring and divesting businesses.

Longstreet also provides services to regional enterprises seeking liquidity events in the near and mid term horizons, including companies that require capital injections or other corporate financings. Longstreet is focused upon partnering with talented managers to help them build thriving businesses, which create substantial value.
